title: Mudhal Pen Niyae lyrics Thambikku Indha ooru Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Mudhal pen niyae
Paarthavuden kandhaanam seidhuviten
adhan peyardhaan kadhal kadhal
Eval thenpattal
punnagaiyal punpatten Ennai
Nane kaivittten yeno yeno

Vinmeen mazhai thuliyaai
En mel pozhindhavaley
Nenjam Medhandheyne unnaley nane.....
Undhan Kangal unnai pol illaye
Ennai parthu poi sollavillaye
Undhan Kangal unnai pol illaye
Ennai parthu poi sollavillaye

Neengadhey ennai Neengadhey
Vaangadhey uyirai Vaangadhey
Idha kadhal vandhal kagidha poovil kooda
Vandugal moikum moikum kangalil theeyai vaikum
Oru mazhai megathil thoongiya thaneeriapol
Nenjukul thengieru en adhal thagam theeru

Undhan Kangal unnai pol illaye
Ennai parthu poi sollavillaye

Un mutham en unavaagum
Un kangal en kanavaagum
En kobam yaavum unnai parthaal theerum
Natkuripellam undhan niyabaga kadhal geetham

Oru uyir polave unnai pooti vaipen
Nenjinil vazhndhuvidu nee endhan sondha veedu
